column5: The living room is 20 X 40 ft.with an open concept gorgeous kitchen and dining room that has wrap around windows.3 large and beautifully designed bed rooms with custom built in XL bunk beds.Unique nautical designs to give the feeling of the ocean and the sea while you have the most comfortable night sleep.The kitchen is open with custom cabinets that have glass doors to let you see what inside 2 bathrooms with vessel sinks and custom built showers that have Lg refreshing shower heads.
